Verses: 1 ivaigalukkup Pinbu, Yoodhargal Yesuvaik Kolaiseyya Vagaithedinapadiyaal, Avar Yoodheyaavile Sanjarikka Manadhillaamal Galileyaavile Sanjariththu Vandhaar.
2 yoodharudaiya Koodaarappandigai Sameebamaayirundhadhu.
3 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Sagodharar Avarai Nokki: Neer Seygira Kiriyaigalai Ummudaiya Seeshargalum Paarkkumpadi Ivvidamvittu Yoodheyaavukkup Pom.
4 prabalamaayirukka Virumbugira Evanum Andharangaththile Ondraiyum Seyyamaattaan; Neer Ippadippattavaigalai Seydhaal Ulagaththukku Ummai Velippaduththum Endraargal.
5 avarudaiya Sagodhararum Avarai Visuvaasiyaadhapadiyaal Ippadi Sonnaargal.
6 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Envelai Innum Varavillai, Ungal Velaiyo Eppozhudhum Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu.
7 ulagam Ungalaip Pagaikkamaattaadhu; Adhin Kiriyaigal Pollaadhavaigalaayirukkiradhendru Naan Saatchikodukkirapadiyinaale Adhu Ennaip Pagaikkiradhu.
8 neengal Indhap Pandigaikkup Pongal; En Velai Innum Varaadhapadiyaal Naan Indhap Pandigaikku Ippozhudhu Pogiradhillai Endraar.
9 ivaigalai Avargaludane Solli, Pinnung Galileyaavile Thanginaar.
10 avarudaiya Sagodharar Ponapinbu, Avar Veliyarangamaaip Pogaamal Andharangamaaip Pandigaikkup Ponaar.
11 pandigaiyile Yoodhargal Avaraith Thedi: Avar Engeyirukkiraar Endraargal.
12 janangalukkulle Avaraikkuriththu Murumuruppundaayitru Silar: Avar Nallavar Endraargal. Verusilar: Appadiyalla, Avan Janangalai Vanjikkiravan Endru Sollikkondaargal.
13 aanaalum Yoodharukkup Bayandhirundhadhinaale, Oruvanum Avaraik Kuriththuth Dhaaraalamaaip Pesavillai.
14 paadhip Pandigaiyaanapodhu, Yesu Dhevaalayaththukkuppoi, Ubadhesampanninaar.
15 appozhudhu Yoodhargal: Ivar Kallaadhavaraayirundhum Vedha Ezhuththukkalai Eppadi Arindhirukkiraar Endru Aachchariyappattaargal.
16 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: En Ubadhesam Ennudaiyadhaayiraamal, Ennai Anuppinavarudaiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
17 avarudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seyya Manadhullavanevano Avan Indha Ubadhesam Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiradho, Naan Suyamaaip Pesugireno Endru Arindhukolluvaan.
18 suyamaaip Pesugiravan Than Suya Magimaiyaith Thedugiraan, Thannai Anuppinavarin Magimaiyaith Thedugiravano Unmaiyullavanaayirukkiraan, Avanidaththil Aneedhiyillai.
19 mose Nyaayappramaanaththai Ungalukkuk Kodukkavillaiyaa? Appadiyirundhum Ungalil Oruvanum Andha Nyaayappramaanaththinpadi Nadakkiradhillai; Neengal En Ennaik Kolaiseyyath Thedugireergal Endraar.
20 janangal Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Nee Pisaasupidiththavan; Unnaik Kolaiseyyath Thedugiravan Yaar Endraargal.
21 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Ore Kiriyaiyai Seydhen, Adhaikkuriththu Ellaarum Aachchariyappadugireergal.
22 viruththasedhanam Moseyinaal Undaagaamal, Pidhaakkalaal Undaayitru; Pinbu Mose Adhai Ungalukku Niyamiththaan; Neengal Oivunaalilum Manushanai Viruththasedhanampannugireergal.

23 moseyin Nyaayappramaanam Meerappadaadhapadikku Oivunaalil Manushan Viruththasedhanam Peralaamendraal, Naan Oivunaalil Oru Manushanai Muzhuvadhum Sugamaakkinadhinaale Enmel Erichchalaayirukkalaamaa?
24 thotraththinpadi Theerppu Seyyaamal, Needhiyinpadi Theerppuseyyungal Endraar.
25 appozhudhu Erusalem Nagaraththaaril Silar Ivanaiyallavaa Kolaiseyyaththedugiraargal?
26 idho, Ivan Dhaaraalamaaip Pesugiraane, Oruvarum Ivanukku Ondrum Sollugiradhillaiye, Meyyaai Ivan Kristhudhaan Endru Adhigaarigal Nichchayamaaga Arindhirukkiraargalo?
27 ivan Inna Idaththilirundhu Vandhavanendru Naam Arindhirukkirom; Kristhu Varumbodho, Avar Inna Idaththilirundhu Varugiravarendru Oruvanum Ariyamaattaane Endraargal.

28 appozhudhu Yesu Dhevaalayaththil Ubadhesikkaiyil Saththamittu: Neengal Ennai Ariveergal, Naan Engeyirundhu Vandhenendrum Ariveergal; Naan Ensuyamaai Varavillai, Ennai Anuppinavar Saththiyamullavar. Avarai Neengal Ariyaadhirukkireergal.
29 naan Avaraal Vandhirukkirapadiyinaalum, Avar Ennai Anuppiyirukkirapadiyinaalum, Naane Avarai Arindhirukkiren Endraar.
30 appozhudhu Avaraip Pidikka Vagaithedinaargal; Aanaalum Avarudaiya Velai Innum Varaadhapadiyinaal Oruvanum Avarmel Kaipodavillai.
31 janangalil Anegar Avarai Visuvaasiththu Kristhu Varumbodhu, Ivar Seygira Arpudhangalaippaarkkilum Adhigam Seyvaaro Endraargal.
32 janangal Avaraik Kuriththu Ippadi Murumurukkiradhaip Pariseyar Kettapozhudhu, Avaraip Pidiththukkonduvarumpadikkup Pariseyarum Pradhaana Aasaariyarum Sevagarai Anuppinaargal.
33 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Innun Konjakkaalam Naan Ungaludanekooda Irundhu, Pinbu Ennai Anuppinavaridaththirkup Pogiren.
34 neengal Ennaith Theduveergal, Aanaalum Ennaik Kaanamaatteergal; Naan Irukkum Idaththirku Neengal Varavunkoodaadhu Endraar.
35 appozhudhu Yoodhargal: Ivarai Naam Kaanaadhapadikku Enge Povaar, Grekkarukkulle Sidhariyirukkiravargalidaththirkup Poi, Grekkarukku Ubadhesampannuvaaro?

36 neengal Ennaith Theduveergal, Aanaalum Ennaik Kaanamaatteergal Endrum, Naan Irukkum Idaththukku Neengal Varakkoodaadhendrum, Ivar Sonna Vaarththaiyin Karuththu Ennavendru Thangalukkulle Sollikkondaargal.
37 pandigaiyin Kadaisinaalaagiya Pradhaana Naalile Yesu Nindru, Saththamittu: Oruvan Thaagamaayirundhaal Ennidaththil Vandhu, Paanampannakkadavan.
38 vedhavaakkiyam Sollugirapadi Ennidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravanevano Avan Ullaththilirundhu Jeevaththanneerulla Nadhigal Odum Endraar.
39 thammai Visuvaasikkiravargal Adaiyappogira Aaviyaikkuriththu Ippadi Sonnaar. Yesu Innum Magimaippadaadhirundhapadiyinaal Parisuththa Aavi Innum Arulappadavillai.
40 janangalil Anegar Indha Vasanaththaik Kettapozhudhu: Meyyaagave Ivar Theerkkadharisiyaanavar Endraargal.
41 verusilar: Ivar Kristhu Endraargal. Verusilar: Kristhu Galileyaavilirundhaa Varuvaar?
42 thaaveedhin Sandhadhiyilum, Thaaveedhu Irundha Pedhlagem Oorilumirundhu Kristhu Varuvaar Endru Vedhavaakkiyam Sollavillaiyaa Endraargal.
43 ivvidhamaaga Avaraikkuriththu Janangalukkulle Pirivinaiyundaayitru.
44 avargalil Silar Avaraip Pidikka Manadhaayirundhaargal; Aagilum Oruvanum Avarmel Kaipodavillai.
45 pinbu Andha Sevagar Pradhaana Aasaariyaridaththirkum Pariseyaridaththirkum Thirumbivandhaargal; Ivargal Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Avanai En Konduvaravillai Endru Kettaargal.
46 sevagar Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Andha Manushan Pesugiradhupola Oruvanum Orukkaalum Pesinadhillai Endraargal.
47 appozhudhu Pariseyar Neengalum Vanjikkappatteergalaa?
48 adhigaarigalilaavadhu Pariseyarilaavadhu Yaadhaamoruvar Avanai Visuvaasiththadhundaa?
49 vedhaththai Ariyaadhavargalaagiya Indha Janangal Sabikkappattavargal Endraargal.
50 raaththiriyile Avaridaththirku Vandhavanum Avargaliloruvanumaagiya Nikkodhemu Enbavan Avargalai Nokki:
51 oru Manushan Solvadhaik Kettu, Avan Seygaigalai Arigiradharku Munne, Avanai Aakkinaikkutpaduththalaamendru Nammudaiya Nyaayappramaanam Sollugiradhaa Endraan.
52 adharku Avargal: Neerum Galileyano? Galileyaavilirundhu Oru Theerkkadharisiyum Ezhumbugiradhillai Enbadhai Aaraaindhupaarum Endraargal.
53 pinbu Avaravar Thangal Thangal Veettukkup Ponaargal.
